column1: NGR is the Vicarage. The gauge about 450 yards north in 1946 to the High School, there is a note station that this is to be considered as the same station number, bur for this record the two locations have been split into two files
1928 to 1930 readings were based on those for Castle Street and have been removed
Aug to Dec 1945 readings are in brackets and have been removed, presumably when the gauge was moved.
